= Settings =

<a href="http://www.flickr.com/photos/28867301@N02/4310521271/" title="Settings by soundflowermakesnoise., on Flickr"><img src="http://farm5.static.flickr.com/4047/4310521271_8c51a48acd.jpg" width="500" height="165" alt="Settings" /></a>

====1. Launchpad initialization====
 * Only connected launchpads can be initialize.
 * Other buttons will be inactive.

====2. Change Emulator View====
 * If you change emulator from launchpad, you can also use the right menu buttons(vol, pan, sndA, sndB, stop, trkOn, solo and arm).

====3. LED View====
 * monome64 has 1 view.
 * monome128 has 2 view.
 * monome256 has 4view.
 * If you change emulator from launchpad, you can also use the top menu buttons(learn, view, 'page<' and 'page>').

====4. Emulator Configs====
 * Change Emulator Device Type and LED Colors.
 * Sub color is only used on MultiColorDevice.


====5. OSC Connection(Use autoconfig, autofocus or manual)====
 * when you use manual connection you must setup host port, receive port and osc prefix.
